item.title: [PT/ES][Support] - Support unreachable
item.description:
Apr 30, 14:59 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Support offer has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 28/04/2025 10:25 UTC
End time : 30/04/2025 07:28 UTC

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Apr 29, 09:30 UTC
Identified - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : The situation is much improved, but we're still working on the active workaround to avoid any inconvenience to the support.

We will keep you informed of any further developments.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Apr 28, 12:41 UTC
Update - We are currently impacted by the Regional Power Outage affecting Spain & Portugal.
Incident Details :

Start time : 28/04/2025 10:25 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Support in Spain and Portugal is unreachable. Support services in Local language are unavailable, calls and chats are being diverted to English speaking personnel.
Customers Impact : Customers cannot contact the local Support. You may experience delays when trying to contact our teams Based in Spain or Portugal
Root Cause : This incident is caused by electrical issue in Spain.
Workaround : Calls are redirected to an English-speaking call center

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Apr 28, 12:28 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an extern event affecting our Support offer.
Start time : 28/04/2025 10:25 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Customer service] API/Control panel/Order funnel degraded service
item.description:
Apr 9, 10:13 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on API/Control panel/Order funnel has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 09/04/2025 09:04 UTC
End time : 09/04/2025 09:15 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Apr 9, 09:50 UTC
Monitoring - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : 15% error rate on the Canadian Customer Panel, Canadian API, and Canadian Order funnel.
Abnormal error rate for European customers using Canadian services between 04/04/2025 09:04 UTC and 04/04/2025 09:10 UTC, followed by another one between 04/04/2025 09:15 UTC and 04/04/2025 09:15 UTC.
Ongoing Actions : Our technical team is monitoring the incident.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Apr 9, 09:17 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 09/04/2025 09:04 UTC
Service impact: High error rates and high response times have been detected on API impacting Customer Panel, OVHcloud API (eu.api.ovh.com, ca.api.ovh.com) and Order funnel.
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Customer Service] - Ticketing tool/ Help Center/ Community portal maintenance notification
item.description:
Jan 16, 20:15 UTC
Completed - We experienced an incident https://customer-service.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/019h0rljxz50 due to an internal network issue that caused the Help Center to be unavailable for approximately 45 minutes. To address this, our team implemented a fix that not only restored the service but also corrected the operations scheduled for the planned maintenance at 22:00 UTC. As a result, those scheduled operations have been canceled.
All services have been operational since 16/01/2025 18:14 UTC

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 14, 16:40 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Ticketing tool, Help Center and Community portal.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 16/01/2025 22:00 UTC
End time : 16/01/2025 22:30 UTC
Service impact : Our Ticketing tool, Help Center and Community Portal will be temporarily unavailable during the operation between 22:00 UTC and 22:30 UTC.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will migrate network infrastructure to improve security and stability.
Workaround : If you have a Business or Enterprise level of support, your dedicated phone number is available to reach you technical advisor in case of emergency.

You can also access our documentation directly on our GitHub repository : https://github.com/ovh/docs/blob/develop/pages/index.md
